basics.name: Mehdi Hasan
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: You can always recover, learn, and build from mistakes, but when you do nothing, that automatically means there is nothing to improve or salvage or discover. - Jeff Haden

work.summary: Working as mobile applications and api developer for leading Norwegian business newspaper Dagens Naeringsliv
highlights: Developing Android application in Java & native Android SDK for DN: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=no.dn.dn
Developing iOS application in Swift and native iOS SDK: https://itunes.apple.com/no/app/dn/id919883184?mt=8
Developing RESTful API for corrosponding mobile applications.
Tech: Java, Swift, Android SDK, iOS SDK, Spring Boot, React Native, MySQL

work.summary: SyndaoApps is a startup from USA which is working to provide flawless communication means to its customers. I am with Syndao from the start & responsible to develop all sorts of softwares required for clients. I have been involved with the entire SDLC process.
highlights: Technologies used: PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Java, MySQL, PWA, Android SDK, iOS SDK, AWS etc.

work.summary: As a startup, iGlyphic focuses on developing small-scale software products which meet the needs of hospitals, stores, fashion houses & different types of non-government organizations.
highlights: Participate in developing strategies and roadmap
Lead a team of freelance developers from scratch to publish:
- 14 ThemeForest products (HTML and Wordpress Themes)
- 8 CodeCanyon products (Android and iOS Applications)
- 5 Google Play Store products (Android Applications)
Lead the development team & participate in the development process.
Delivered multiple successful projects to the clients.
Introduce GIT instead of SVN as VCS.
Managed five different teams & 7 different projects (Android, IOS, Web & API, Design & QA) of total 21+ people
Delivered 3 completed projects to clients within 2 months of joining
Conduct interview of software developers
Introduced quarterly inner house training sessions
Projects: Mahash, Zamen, sloppy, love-lane, d-liv, NPS, ywaper

work.summary: W3Engineers is an interactive web application development and consulting firm that utilizes latest technology, creative design and optimized business strategy to help businesses build their brand.
highlights: Published first Native Android product from the Company
Published first iOS product (Native SDK) from the Company
Conduct meeting with clients
Conduct interview of software developers from 4 team members to 20+ team members (Android and iOS team)
Lead the development team (YO! App product) from the scratch to MVP towards 250,000+ download

work.summary: IIMI helps organizations of all types and sizes transform their data into information and knowledge, driving insight and action. I was responsible to provide system / networking service to more than 3500+ data entry operators and software engineers
Aamra networks limited is one of the leader of communication solutions industry in Bangladesh.
highlights: End user Gateway Server/Router/Switch/Polycom installation and troubleshooting.
Provide solution to customers remotely.

education.studyType: B.Sc in Information and Communication Engineering
